Class MinigameThinIce

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArcadeMinigame

    public class MinigameThinIce
extends MinigameTemplateBreakingFloor
    A survival minigame, where you have to shoot players off the breaking floor.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
